column1: # ^ scalingPercent uses the 'percent' type: accepts "150%" (parsed as 1.5) or "3/2" (parsed as 1.5)
# ^ cooldown:float:5.0 has a LITERAL default of 5.0 - empty cells get this value
# ^ areaRadius:float:0.0 has a LITERAL default of 0.0
# ^   Expression defaults reference other columns via self.columnName and can call library functions.
# ^   When a cell provides an explicit value (like =0 for iceShield), it overrides the default.

column9: A ball of fire that explodes on impact
A protective barrier of ice that deals no damage
Shakes the ground in a wide area
A bolt of pure shadow energy
A radiant beam that heals allies and damages undead
